summary: CAR SUDDENLY LEAKED COOLANT, ENGINE TEMP WAS READING HOT ON DASH.  THOUGHT PROBLEM WAS RELATED TO A STUCK THERMOSTAT, REPLACED THERMOSTAT AND COOLANT.  BELT STARTS SLIPPING A COUPLE WEEKS LATER, AND ENGINE LIGHT COMES ON.  IN THE PROCESS OF REPLACING RADIATOR, WATER PUMP, AND BELT.    *NLM
